LanguageData.USAC_DisposableBattery.label: disposable battery
LanguageData.USAC_DisposableBattery.description: A disposable battery designed to rapidly charge mechanoids. To prevent safety hazards from unauthorized modification, it is designed to short-circuit and self-destruct after a single use.
LanguageData.USAC_DisposableRepairTool.label: disposable repair tool
LanguageData.USAC_DisposableRepairTool.description: A square nano-storage container that releases nanomachines to analyze and repair damaged structures. Designed for single-use to ensure safety and corporate compliance.
LanguageData.USAC_MealSurvivalPack.label: B-Ration
LanguageData.USAC_MealSurvivalPack.description: A military meal made from a soft split bun, compressed protein patty, and some sharp sauce. Its patented sealed packaging allows it to remain viable for decades when heated unopened. Along with stable calories, it contains a sustained-release analgesic formula that reduces bodily pain for about half a day.
